visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the name 'Temperature' with the provided data. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom background color, margin settings, and a styled title with a specific font size and color. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with labels and titles having defined colors and font sizes. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the provided data points, with a custom color applied to the series. Additionally, the legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
